Articles.Content:
Hey everyone !

After 100+ hours of flight, i've decided it was about time to sign up here and exchange with the community

I'm a 21yo french Kerbal-fan in my final year of study in Master's degree.

I ain't mastering introduction on forum so basically here it is x) Feel free to ask me anything

Have a nice day
Hello. What are you mastering with your degree?

Hey Vanamonde,

I'm getting a Master in Management from one of the top Business School in France
My mastery lies in Library Science. It was a good career choice, as I work with extremely nice people, which is important to me. I hope you enjoy your career choice. Anyway, welcome to the forum.
